record.description: Thomas E. Donnelley, recently appointed honorary co-chairman of the University of Chicago Citizens Board. Mr. Donnelly is president of RR Donnelley and Sons, and served on the university's board of trustees from 1909 until 1938. He is at present an honorary trustee of the university.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Archives, photographer and date stamps, attached caption obscures half of maker photo number . White paint on surface, writing (edited out in Photoshop).
